definition: to die in such a way that sb (or sth) else also perishes/to take sb down with oneself/to end in mutual destruction
like/same/similar/together/alike/with
(used in given names)/variant of 同[tong2]
see 衚衕|胡同[hu2 tong4]
surname Gui

to return/to go back to/to give back to/(of a responsibility) to be taken care of by/to belong to/to gather together/(used between two identical verbs) despite/to marry (of a woman) (old)/division on the abacus with a one-digit divisor
surname Yu
to go/to take/sentence-final interrogative particle/variant of 於|于[yu2]
in/at/to/from/by/than/out of
to use up/to exhaust/to end/to finish/to the utmost/exhausted/finished/to the limit (of sth)/all/entirely
to the greatest extent/(when used before a noun of location) furthest or extreme/to be within the limits of/to give priority to

sentences.english: We are moving to replace mutually assured destruction with mutual cooperation.
sentences.chinese: 我们正在采取行动，以共同合作代替同归于尽。

sentences.english: This well where drank so many of the dead was destined to die itself.
sentences.chinese: 这口被许多死人喝过水的井也该同归于尽。

sentences.english: Finally, in order to protect her Wolf sun, end up with golden eagles.
sentences.chinese: 最后，她为了保护自己的狼孙，与金雕同归于尽了。

sentences.english: Buha by the go, just want to die and come to a boar's.
sentences.chinese: 布哈依这次去，就是想和公猪来个同归于尽的。

sentences.english: Third, they would attack their adversaries, smear them and threaten to drag them down with them.
sentences.chinese: 第三步则是反咬对手，抹黑大家，威胁一起同归于尽。

sentences.english: Tarkin never returned, having died in the explosion that consumed the Death Star.
sentences.chinese: 塔金再也没有回来，他和死星在爆炸中同归于尽。

definition: to burn both jade and common stone/to destroy indiscriminately (idiom)
lit. either the fish dies or the net splits/a life and death struggle (idiom)
both sides suffer (idiom)/neither side wins
to fight to one's last gasp
to go all out for sth at risk of one's life
fight to the death/desperate struggle
to brave it out/to the bitter end
to explode/spontaneous detonation/self-detonation/suicide bombing/to disclose private matters about oneself
to fight with all one has
to meet force with force/painstaking
lit. you die, I live (idiom); irreconcilable adversaries/two parties cannot coexist
to wait helplessly for death (idiom)/to resign oneself to extinction
to mount a sneak attack/to raid
the two cannot exist together (idiom); irreconcilable differences/incompatible standpoints
to kill to the last one (idiom)/to exterminate/to eradicate/ruthless
to place sb on field of death/to confront with mortal danger/to give sb no way out/with one's back to the wall/looking death in the eye/part of idiom 置之死地而後生|置之死地而后生
